typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		{ hack_license} as string,
		{ vendor_id} as string,
		{ pickup_datetime} as string,
		{ payment_type} as string,
		{ fare_amount} as string,
		{ surcharge} as string,
		{ mta_tax} as string,
		{ tip_amount} as string,
		{ tolls_amount} as string,
		{ total_amount} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			trim($$) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FixColumns
FixColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['taxi_fares.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
